      • removeCardFromPlayerHand

        public void removeCardFromPlayerHand(Move move)
        The passed Move has a color, picked by the user. But in the hand on the server, the color is null. This when you call the remove method (in removeCard), it wil not find the card, because it's not equal.
        Parameters:
        move -

      • drawCards
